FUA - Email to be sent to any new supervisor and copy to student, when a change is made with regards to supervisor team for Gippsland students only
SUBJECT HEADING Gippsland Pro-Forma Revisit - due to Supervision Changes
Dear SUPERVISOR
I am writing to you concerning the recent Change of Supervision Form which nominates you as STUDENT'S NAME new MAIN/ASSOC supervisor. As a result of this change, can you please review the current pro-forma in place (copy attached) and provide written confirmation to MGE that you are happy with the transition plan that has been put in place to manage STUDENT's NAME candidature to completion.
Should you have any concerns regarding the process, you are welcome to contact me on this email account.
Kind regards,
{!User.FirstName}
